statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); current_dir=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); style=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.output_style.name'); dir_display=$(echo "$current_dir" | sed 's|^/Users/michael|~|'); git_info=""; if [ -d "$current_dir/.git" ] || git -C "$current_dir" rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -C "$current_dir" branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo "detached"); if [ ! -z "$branch" ]; then if ! git -C "$current_dir" diff --quiet 2>/dev/null || ! git -C "$current_dir" diff --cached --quiet 2>/dev/null; then git_info=" \033[33m⚡$branch\033[0m"; else git_info=" \033[32m⎇ $branch\033[0m"; fi; fi; fi; timestamp=$(date +"%H:%M"); printf "\033[2m[%s]\033[0m \033[36m%s\033[0m \033[2m@\033[0m \033[34m%s\033[0m%s \033[2m[%s]\033[0m" "$timestamp" "$model" "$(basename "$dir_display")" "$git_info" "$style"
